ModuleDescription: This module provides a comprehensive understanding on the basic principles and applications of statistics in the pharmaceutical setting. The major topics to be covered include: basic statistics; graphical methods; probability distributions; estimation and sample size determination; testing of means; Anova; categorical data analysis; correlation; regression; non-parametric tests. This module covers information and uses practical examples that are relevant to the various stages of drug development, ranging from pre-clinical and clinical development to post-market surveillance, consumer health, and health services research.
